page.title: 16Torphichen Gala Day
page.content: Every year in Torphichen a celebration takes place on the second last Saturday of June. This is Torphichen Gala Day which is the culmination of a week of social events. A girl, chosen from the 12-13 year olds, is crowned Queen of the Gala Day. The Gala Day is a pageant with the Queen and her attendants such as Flower Girls, Knights of St John and Fairies taking part. During the pageant invited guests are presented to the Queen who then makes a speech thanking everyone including the crowds that come to watch. Some people who have children in the Gala Day decorate their house traditionally with spruce branches and bunting, then the morning before the crowning ceremony the houses are judged. The Queen presents prizes for the best decorated house.
